And the closing act? There were two: New Order and the Pet Shop Boys, who, as part of a co-headlining tour this summer, were supposed to close the Bowl season. Thanks to "Quarantunes" they did it. Lisa Rinna Gets Nostalgic Over Happy 'RHOBH' Photos Amid Drama-Filled Season 10 ...  to play out , Rinna looked back on some of the happier times the cast shared last season in a new post to Instagram. Rinna posted a throwback photo of her sharing a laugh with co-stars Teddi Mellencamp, Kyle Richards, and Dorit Kemsley during a cast trip to Hawaii for an episode from the ninth season of the long-running reality show. The photo was shot at the reception for Camille Grammer's wedding to David C. Meyer, where Kyle served as a bridesmaid. Not only are the Bravo beauties glammed up for the shot, but they truly appear to be enjoying one another's company with no jealousy as a rainbow appears in the background. In the caption to the photo, Rinna admitted she had "no idea" why she was posting photos from last season's Real ...

Four Diamonds hosts Giving Day FTK and Virtual Celebration featuring Andy Grammer ...  upended normal operations, including canceling many Mini-THON events, Four Diamonds remains committed to conquering childhood cancer. This Thursday, Four Diamonds is hosting Giving Day FTK, a day-long virtual fundraiser to support the children and families battling cancer at Penn State Children's Hospital. Giving Day FTK will culminate in an online celebration featuring performances by Grammy-winning singer/songwriter Andy Grammer and Go Go Gadjet, to thank and celebrate donors, Four Diamonds families, care providers, volunteers, and THON and Mini-THON students.
